channel.title: News in Brief â€“ Daily Joke Feed
channel.description: Auto-curated daily briefs for joke writing. Updated manually by request.

item.title: Kentucky man caught trying to scrap entire stolen bridge
item.description: Police in Kentucky recovered a 40-foot bridge that a man had disassembled and attempted to sell for scrap metal.

item.title: Massachusetts man drives into pond while following GPS
item.description: A man drove into a pond in Lawrence, MA after blindly following his GPS directions. He escaped unharmed.

item.title: Thieves steal $20,000 in cheese from Wisconsin truck stop
item.description: An entire shipment of artisan cheese was stolen from a parked semi-truck in Wisconsin. Authorities say it may have been targeted.

item.title: Japanese town sues monkey mascot for contract breach
item.description: A Japanese town is suing its monkey-costumed tourism mascot for skipping appearances and damaging public image.

item.title: Florida man tries to outrun cops on riding lawnmower
item.description: A Florida man led deputies on a slow-speed chase while riding a stolen lawnmower. He was arrested after driving into a ditch.
